steps.script:
machine = frappe.get_doc(
	{
		"doctype": "Virtual Machine",
		"cluster": arguments.cluster,
		"domain": arguments.domain,
		"series": arguments.series,
		"disk_size": arguments.disk_size,
		"machine_type": arguments.machine_type,
		"virtual_machine_image": arguments.image,
		"team": arguments.team,
	}
).insert()
if arguments.series == "f":
    server = machine.create_server()
else:
    server = machine.create_database_server()
server.plan = arguments.plan
server.title = arguments.title
server.save()
server.create_subscription(arguments.plan)

arguments["machine"] = machine.name
arguments["server"] = server.name

machine = frappe.get_doc("Virtual Machine", arguments.machine)
machine.sync()
result = machine.status == "Running"
steps.step_name: Wait for Virtual Machine to Start

steps.script:
server = frappe.get_doc(arguments.server_type, arguments.server)
server.ping_ansible()

server = frappe.get_doc(arguments.server_type, arguments.server)
server.prepare_server()

plays = frappe.get_all("Ansible Play", {"server": arguments.server, "play": "Prepare AWS EC2 Server", "status": "Success"})
result = plays
steps.step_name: Wait for Server to be Prepared

steps.script:
server = frappe.get_doc(arguments.server_type, arguments.server)
server.ping_ansible()

server = frappe.get_doc(arguments.server_type, arguments.server)
server.rename_server()

plays = frappe.get_all("Ansible Play", {"server": arguments.server, "play": f"Rename {arguments.server_type}", "status": "Success"})
result = plays
steps.step_name: Wait for Server to be Renamed

steps.script:
machine = frappe.get_doc("Virtual Machine", arguments.machine)
machine.stop()

machine = frappe.get_doc("Virtual Machine", arguments.machine)
machine.sync()
result = machine.status == "Stopped"
steps.step_name: Wait for Virtual Machine to Stop

steps.script:
machine = frappe.get_doc("Virtual Machine", arguments.machine)
machine.resize(arguments.machine_type)

machine = frappe.get_doc("Virtual Machine", arguments.machine)
machine.start()

machine = frappe.get_doc("Virtual Machine", arguments.machine)
machine.sync()
result = machine.status == "Running"
steps.step_name: Wait for Virtual Machine to Start

steps.script:
machine = frappe.get_doc("Virtual Machine", arguments.machine)
machine.stop()

machine = frappe.get_doc("Virtual Machine", arguments.machine)
machine.sync()
result = machine.status == "Stopped"
steps.step_name: Wait for Virtual Machine to Stop

steps.script:
machine = frappe.get_doc("Virtual Machine", arguments.machine)
arguments.image = machine.create_image()

machine = frappe.get_doc("Virtual Machine", arguments.machine)
machine.start()

machine = frappe.get_doc("Virtual Machine", arguments.machine)
machine.sync()
result = machine.status == "Running"
steps.step_name: Wait for Virtual Machine to Start

steps.script:
image = frappe.get_doc("Virtual Machine Image", arguments.image)
image.sync()
result = image.status == "Available"

machine = frappe.get_doc("Virtual Machine", arguments.machine)
machine.disable_termination_protection()

machine = frappe.get_doc("Virtual Machine", arguments.machine)
machine.terminate()

machine = frappe.get_doc("Virtual Machine", arguments.machine)
machine.sync()
result = machine.status == "Terminated"
steps.step_name: Wait for Virtual Machine to Terminate
